footer.1: This tool is offered by the
footer.pcl: Clinical Pharmacology Department of the University Hospital of Vaud (PCL - CHUV, Switzerland)
footer.heig: School of Engineering and Management Vaud (HEIG-VD)
footer.report: This N-of-1 test was performed using the "N-of-1 Companion" tool, available online and offered by the Clinical Pharmacology Service of the Centre Hospitalier Universitaire Vaudois (PCL-CHUV, Switzerland).

formErrors.noWhiteSpace: No spaces, tabs or line breaks
formErrors.oneDigitOrSpecial: At least one digit or one special character
formErrors.invalidPassword: Your password does not meet the security criteria
formErrors.number: Please enter a number (integer and without space)
formErrors.textarea: Allowed: letters, digits, spaces and the following characters: ',.:;"/+-?!#%()
formErrors.userAlreadyExists2: An user with the same email address already exists !
formErrors.userNotFound: No users found with this email address
formErrors.unexpectedErrorMsg: An error occurred, please try again
formErrors.integerRange: Must be an integer between 0 and 299 (or empty)

button.backToNof1: Back to the N-of-1 tests page

posology-table.fraction-desc: Indicates how many fractions (capsules, tablets, etc) the total dose should be divided into. Example: fractions=2 & dose=100mg means 2 parts of 50mg.

xlsx.decreasing-dosage-info: Additional administration scheme for substances requiring decreasing treatment (at period change).

print.warning: *Check the print settings for correct rendering. In particular the margins (default) and the scaling (real size, 100% or default).
print.warning2: Prefer direct printing if these parameters cannot be modified when saving as a PDF (this is the case for Chrome, for example. FireFox and Edge allow printing in PDF that respects the dimensions).

statistics.NaiveANOVA-desc: This test considers each observation as independent.
statistics.CycleANOVA-long: ANOVA for treatment effect by cycle
statistics.CycleANOVA-desc: This test contrasts treatment effects among cycles, thus, getting rid of the repetition issue.
statistics.ANCOVAautoregr-long: ANCOVA for treatment effect accounting for autocorrelation
statistics.ANCOVAautoregr-desc: This test compares treatment responses accounting for autocorrelation in observations (AR(1) auto-regressive component).

errors.test-not-found: This N-of-1 test does not exist !
